system.description: Effect: The user freely Teleports up to their Teleport Score. If they don't have a Teleport Score, their effective Teleport Score is 8 for this Attack.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: Effect: The user freely Teleports up to their Teleport Score. If they don't have a Teleport Score, their effective Teleport Score is 8 for this Attack.
